snippet: Southern California cornerback Josh Shaw confessed that he lied to school officials about how he sprained his ankles last weekend, retracting his story about jumping off a balcony to save his drowning nephew....

headline.print_headline: USC's Shaw Admits to Lying About Injuries, Rescue
headline.main: USC's Shaw Admits to Lying About Injuries, Rescue

lead_paragraph: Southern California cornerback Josh Shaw confessed that he lied to school officials about how he sprained his ankles last weekend, retracting his story about jumping off a balcony to save his drowning nephew.
